results.title: Comparison of simvastatin gel and amnion membrane gel for preventing postoperative intra-abdominal adhesion formation in rat model.
results.text_hl: Histopathological reports also confirmed higher @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@adhesion@@@ score in the control group compared to the amnion and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ groups.

results.title: The role of simvastatin on postoperative peritoneal adhesion formation in an animal model.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Intraperitoneal @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ application decreases @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@adhesion@@@ formation by increasing the @GENE_PLAT @GENE_25692 @@@t-PA@@@ level in abdominal surgery.

citations.NLM: Kucuk HF, Kaptanoglu L, Kurt N, Uzun H, Eser M, Bingul S, Torlak OA, Akyol H. The role of simvastatin on postoperative peritoneal adhesion formation in an animal model. Eur Surg Res. 2007;39(2):98-102. PMID: 17283433

results.title: Reduction of epidural scar adhesion by topical application of simvastatin after laminectomy in rats.
results.text_hl: Little epidural @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@adhesions@@@ were seen in the laminectomy sites treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Effects of Intraperitoneal Administration of Simvastatin in Prevention of Postoperative Intra-abdominal Adhesion Formation in Animal Model of Rat.
results.text_hl: Pathologically, in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group, 6 @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (37.5%) had first-grade @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@adhesion@@@, while in control group, 11 @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (68.8%) had first- and 5 (31.2%) had second-grade @<m>DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@adhesions@@@ (p<0.001).

citations.NLM: Javaherzadeh M, Shekarchizadeh A, Kafaei M, Mirafshrieh A, Mosaffa N, Sabet B. Effects of Intraperitoneal Administration of Simvastatin in Prevention of Postoperative Intra-abdominal Adhesion Formation in Animal Model of Rat. Bull Emerg Trauma. 2016 Jul;4(3):156-60. PMID: 27540550
